block.p: Eliza Fitch, the daughter of Lucie and Jonathan Fitch of Chappaqua, N.Y., and Michael Ross Packard, a son of Lynn and Stephen Packard of Edison, N.J., were married yesterday evening. Rabbi Albert Sturmer officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y., with the Rev. J. Perry Wootten, a Presbyterian minister, taking part.
Mrs. Packard, 27, is an art director at Carlson & Partners, an advertising agency in New York.

Eliza Fitch, the daughter of Lucie and Jonathan Fitch of Chappaqua, N.Y., and Michael Ross Packard, a son of Lynn and Stephen Packard of Edison, N.J., were married yesterday evening. Rabbi Albert Sturmer officiated at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y., with the Rev. J. Perry Wootten, a Presbyterian minister, taking part.
Mrs. Packard, 27, is an art director at Carlson & Partners, an advertising agency in New York.
Mr. Packard, also 27, is an account executive at Arc Mills, a textile converter in New York.
The couple graduated from the University of Colorado, but did not meet until after they had moved to New York.
